## Welcome

I am **Ali Bina (PhD)**, a results-driven Senior AI/ML Engineer and Consultant at Microsoft Germany, with over 10 years of hands-on experience in software development, data science, machine learning, and AI. I specialize in the fascinating intersection of **Artificial Intelligence** and **Material Science**, focusing on cutting-edge **Large Language Model (LLM) technologies**, including Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), agent-based systems, and multimodal AI applications.

My expertise spans from **model pre-training and fine-tuning to evaluation and deployment**, with deep proficiency in Python (PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, Hugging Face Transformers), C++, and designing/optimizing complex ML pipelines for enterprise applications.
:::

::: {.content-section}
## Research Interests & Expertise

My work encompasses several key areas where AI and materials science converge:

### **Advanced LLM Technologies**
- **Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)** for scientific discovery
- **Agent-based systems** for materials research automation
- **Multimodal AI applications** processing text, images, and formulas
- **Fine-tuning and optimization** of large language models (Llama, GPT series)

### **AI-Driven Materials Discovery**
- **Multi-agent LLM systems** for materials research via literature/patent search
- **Dynamic knowledge graph construction** for scientific data
- **HPC simulation integration** and automation
- **Variational Autoencoders (VAE)** for multimodal latent space representation

### **Machine Learning for Scientific Applications**
- **Computer vision** for microscopy image analysis and quality assessment
- **Deep learning models** optimization using CUDA and GPU enhancements
- **Natural language processing** for literature mining and document understanding
- **Statistical modeling** and anomaly detection

### **Enterprise AI Solutions**
- **MLOps and LLMOps** best practices for scalable deployment
- **End-to-end ML pipeline** design and optimization
- **Customer technical engagements** and solution architecture
- **Cross-functional collaboration** with domain experts
:::
